name: Dropzone
description: This component provides a way to upload files to a server.

properties.name: acceptedFileTypes
properties.label: Accepted File Types
properties.settingTooltip: The file types that dropzone should accept.

properties.name: targetDirectory
properties.label: Target Directory
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler where you can determine the path of the directory where the file(s) will be uploaded to.
properties.settingTooltip: The path of the directory where the file(s) will be uploaded to.

properties.name: maxFiles
properties.label: Max Files
properties.settingTooltip: Maximum number of files to be accepted.

properties.name: maxFileSize
properties.label: Max File Size
properties.settingTooltip: Maximum file size allowed in bytes.

properties.name: overwriteFiles
properties.label: Overwrite Files
properties.settingTooltip: Select to overwrite existing files.

properties.name: label
properties.label: Label
properties.defaultValue: Drop Files here or click to browse
properties.settingTooltip: Define the label to place when no files selected.

properties.name: headerVisibility
properties.label: Header Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Select to show the header in the dropzone.

properties.name: footerVisibility
properties.label: Footer Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Select to show the footer in the dropzone.

properties.name: language
properties.label: Language
properties.settingTooltip: Select the language to present labels.

properties.name: onDropBehaviour
properties.label: On Drop Behaviour
properties.settingTooltip: Select the behaviour on drop files.

properties.name: clickable
properties.label: Clickable
properties.settingTooltip: Select to open the file dialog after the dropzone is clicked.

properties.name: minHeight
properties.label: Min Height
properties.settingTooltip: The minimum height of the dropzone container.

properties.name: cleanButtonVisibility
properties.label: Clean Button Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Select to show the button for cleaning not valid files.

properties.name: autoClean
properties.label: Auto Clean
properties.settingTooltip: Select to automatically remove non valid files.

properties.name: downloadButtonVisibility
properties.label: Download Button Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Select to show the button to download a file.

properties.name: uploadOnDrop
properties.label: Upload On Drop
properties.settingTooltip: Select to upload on drop file(s).

properties.name: themeColor
properties.label: Theme Color
properties.settingTooltip: Set the main color for dropzone labels and borders.

properties.name: showInfoLayer
properties.label: Show Info Layer
properties.settingTooltip: Select to show the info layer and the info button for dropzone items.

properties.name: activeItems
properties.label: Always Active Items
properties.settingTooltip: Select to show all actions and buttons for dropzone items.

properties.name: preview
properties.label: Preview
properties.settingTooltip: Select to show the preview of valid dropzone items.

properties.name: borderWidth
properties.label: Border Width
properties.settingTooltip: The width of the dropzone border.

properties.name: borderStyle
properties.label: Border Style
properties.settingTooltip: The style of the dropzone border.

properties.name: borderColor
properties.label: Border Color
properties.settingTooltip: The color of the dropzone border.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.settingTooltip: Select to disable the dropzone.
properties.handlerDescription: This is the handler for the logic to determine whether the dropzone should be enabled or disabled. If the handler returns true, the component will be disabled.

properties.name: disableRipple
properties.label: Disable Ripple
properties.settingTooltip: Select to disable a ripple effect every time the user drops files or clicks the dropzone.

eventHandlers.name: fileNameLogic
eventHandlers.label: File Name Logic
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This is a handler where you can determine the name of the file which it will be saved with.

eventHandlers.name: onChange
eventHandlers.label: On Change Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the value of the file list is changed.

eventHandlers.name: onDelete
eventHandlers.label: On Delete Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps the Close button.

eventHandlers.name: onClean
eventHandlers.label: On Clean Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps the Clean button.

eventHandlers.name: onUpload
eventHandlers.label: On Upload Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This is a handler where you can define the logic for uploading files. If the handler contains no logic, the files upload operation delivers a files in the Backendless file storage of your application.

eventHandlers.name: onUploadFailed
eventHandlers.label: On Upload Failed Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered if the upload of the file(s) results in an error.
